abstract: Mary T. Barra, who will be the next chief executive of General Motors, visited The New York Times in November and sat down with reporters and editors.
snippet: Mary T. Barra, who will be the next chief executive of General Motors, visited The New York Times in November and sat down with reporters and editors.
lead_paragraph: Mary T. Barra, who was named the next chief executive of General Motors on Tuesday, visited The New York Times in November and talked with reporters and editors. What follows is an edited, condensed version of the interview.

headline.main: Mary Barra, G.M.’s New Chief, Speaking Her Mind
